'''Oatbarton''' was a town or village in the [[Northfarthing]] of [[the Shire]]. The [[Northway]] led from Oatbarton to the [[East Road]].<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> 

==Etymology==
The element ''-barton'', common in English place-names ([[Old English]]: ''beretun'' "barley-town") means "outlying grange, demesne farm",<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xlviii</ref> therefore the place was related to a large oat-farm.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2008: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Oatbarton is located within the in-game [[Evendim]] region, just outside of the Shire proper, although this is merely a gameplay distinction. It is a farm town, with the largest Northcotton farm located directly to the west of it. [[Halfast Gamgee]] lives in Oatbarton.
